welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Wasquehal, a charming city known for its picturesque streets and vibrant culture. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to discover all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for all commercial flights at Lesquin Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and low-cost flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kortrijk Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kortrijk Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Merville/Calonne Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Merville/Calonne Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
